backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw app defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases and user profiles, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report identifying a high-confidence task to audit and restore regressed React Query hook logic in useQueries.ts that caused surgery cases to silently fail to load between versions 87 and 91.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, hook, and utility in the SurgiPaw frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, setting the app title, favicon, viewport meta tags, PWA manifest link, and mounting the React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and bypass rules for API calls and Internet Identity flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky app header with login/logout controls.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component that uses Internet Identity for authentication and clears the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter their name on first login, submitting the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation with toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration array for case tasks (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) and exports utility functions to compute default selections, remaining items, completed counts, and Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Renders a collapsible card for a surgery case showing patient info, species icon, sex/age/date, and interactive checklist task badges with completion toggling.
Modal dialog for editing an existing surgery case, pre-populating all fields from the case data and submitting updates via the useUpdateCase mutation.
Modal dialog for creating a new surgery case with form validation, speech-to-text quick-fill, structured text parsing, debounced previous-case search, and checklist task selection.
Main list view for surgery cases that fetches all cases and applies search, species/task filters, sort, and highlights a specific case, with PDF export and CSV import/export support.
Controlled search input component with a search icon and a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for choosing a sort option from the predefined SORT_OPTIONS list, displaying an ArrowUpDown icon alongside.
A popover filter component for filtering surgery cases by species (canine, feline, other) with checkboxes, persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering surgery cases by task types and completion status, persisting filter state to sessionStorage.
A checklist UI component that renders task checkboxes in either 'creation' mode (selecting which tasks apply) or 'completion' mode (marking tasks done), with color-coded styling per task.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, handling parsing errors, progress tracking, and creating or updating cases via backend mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-formatting and a calendar popover picker, with auto-advance on complete input.
Utility module for exporting surgery cases to CSV and importing cases from a CSV file, including row parsing, validation, and matching against existing cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, row type, and validation constants for species, sex, boolean, and date formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides functions to filter surgery cases by species, incomplete task types, all-tasks-completed status, and to exclude fully completed cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API to provide recording state, transcript accumulation, error handling, and start/stop controls.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object, mapping recognized field labels to typed values including species, sex, dates, and strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a styled HTML report of surgery cases with outstanding checklist tasks, rendered in a hidden iframe.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of surgery cases listing remaining checklist tasks, using a timestamped filename and proper CSV field escaping.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides utility functions to format case data (dates, species, sex, text) into human-readable strings for PDF display.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides utility functions to format case data (dates, species, sex) into human-readable strings for CSV/report display, mirroring pdfFormatters.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of SurgeryCase objects by matching a query string against case fields and remaining (selected but incomplete) checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that orders SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constant option arrays for species and sex dropdowns, and the CaseFormData interface used in case creation/editing forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and date parsing/formatting utilities, including conversion between Date objects and nanosecond bigints for the backend.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases with search, filter, sort, and task-toggle functionality, along with summary stats and PDF export.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open task items from individual cases and calculate the total open task count across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the stabilized value after the delay elapses.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend canister data including surgery cases, user profiles, tasks, and OpenAI config, scoped per authenticated Internet Identity principal.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-mode design system (colors, radius, semantic tokens).
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file intended to provide type augmentation for the jspdf-autotable library.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file intended to provide type augmentation for the jsPDF library.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for Worker, recognition results, bounding boxes, and enums for PSM/OEM modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and font family, and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for SurgiPaw describing a known regression where surgery cases stopped loading after Version 91, with pending audit tasks for both frontend React Query hooks and backend canister query logic.
